com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations

Annotation Type ComplexField


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
 @Documented
public @interface ComplexField
    Created by fonso on 27.03.17.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Operator advanceFilter 
      float boost
      Add a fixed index-time boost for this field.
      Operator facet 
      Operator fullText 
      boolean indexed
      EXPERT: Mark this field as indexed.
      Language language
      Enable language-specific analysis of this field in the full-text index.
      java.lang.String name
      The name of this field in the Index.
      Operator sort 
      Operator store 
      Operator suggestion 

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The name of this field in the Index. If left out, the name of the annotated Field will be used.
        Default:
        ""

      • indexed

        public abstract boolean indexed
        EXPERT: Mark this field as indexed. Indexed fields can be part of a query.
        Returns:
        boolean flag true if the field is indexed or false when not.
        Default:
        true

      • store

        public abstract Operator store
        Default:
        @com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.Operator(function=com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.ComplexField.NullFunction.class)

      • facet

        public abstract Operator facet
        Default:
        @com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.Operator(function=com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.ComplexField.NullFunction.class)

      • suggestion

        public abstract Operator suggestion
        Default:
        @com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.Operator(function=com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.ComplexField.NullFunction.class)

      • fullText

        public abstract Operator fullText
        Default:
        @com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.Operator(function=com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.ComplexField.NullFunction.class)

      • advanceFilter

        public abstract Operator advanceFilter
        Default:
        @com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.Operator(function=com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.ComplexField.NullFunction.class)

      • sort

        public abstract Operator sort
        Default:
        @com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.Operator(function=com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.ComplexField.NullFunction.class)

      • language

        public abstract Language language
        Enable language-specific analysis of this field in the full-text index. If set empty or null a generic (language-agnostic) analysis will be used.
        Returns:
        Language of the complex field. By default none.
        Default:
        com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations.language.Language.None

      • boost

        public abstract float boost
        Add a fixed index-time boost for this field. Matches in boosted fields will be ranked higher in the result list.
        Returns:
        float number with the boost of the field. By default 1.
        Default:
        1.0f
